entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Struct constructor with only optional parameters not used #71954
  • Produce type/member level source link information in docs xml #71953
  • Analyzers should only include libraries not provided by the framework #71952

Closed

  • C# Collection Expression for arrays can't be outlined / folded in text editor #71932
    Backlog
  • If pattern match is not correct when cast without if ` bool casted = s is string s1;` #71955

PullRequests

Merged

  • Implement code folding for collection expression #71951
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify serialization code #71944
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update absolute links to relative #71925
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
